requestBody.description: The information for a single iOS device

udid.description: The Unique Device IDentifier of the device

model.description: The model identifier of the device, in the format iDeviceM,N

os_build.description: The build number of the last known OS version running on the device

os_version.description: The last known OS version running on the device

serial.description: The device's serial number. Always empty or undefined at present.

imei.description: The device's International Mobile Equipment Identity number. Always empty or undefined at present.

owner_id.description: The user ID of the device owner.
